level.heading: Targeted services.
level.text: Targeted services shall consist of those tasks that the Mayor has determined will foster the independence, self-sufficiency, and noninstitutionalized living of eligible persons and shall fall within the following categories:
Those tasks, such as respite care, personal grooming, and meal preparation, that, when performed in the home, address the personal care needs of an eligible person;
Those tasks, such as light housekeeping, heavy cleaning, and minor repairs, that, when performed in or around the home, address the environmental needs of an eligible person;
Those tasks, such as exercise and recreational therapy, that address the physical or rehabilitative needs of an eligible person; and
Those tasks, such as transportation and escort, that address the ability of an eligible person to function outside the home.
